TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DrawItemState extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the state of an item that is being drawn.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This enumeration is used by members such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemEventArgs.State%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> property to perform custom drawing of the items in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox>.
[!code-vb[MeasureItemEventArgs#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.windows.forms.d_33_1.vb)] [!code-cpp[MeasureItemEventArgs#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.windows.forms.d_33_1.cpp)] [!code-cs[MeasureItemEventArgs#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.windows.forms.d_33_1.cs)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState Checked = int32(8)

Docs.summary: The item is checked. Only menu controls use this value.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState ComboBoxEdit = int32(4096)

Docs.summary: The item is the editing portion of a .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState Default = int32(32)

Docs.summary: The item is in its default visual state.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState Disabled = int32(4)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState Focus = int32(16)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState Grayed = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The item is grayed. Only menu controls use this value.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState HotLight = int32(64)

Docs.summary: The item is being hot-tracked, that is, the item is highlighted as the mouse pointer passes over it.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState Inactive = int32(128)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState NoAccelerator = int32(256)

Docs.summary: The item displays without a keyboard accelerator.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState NoFocusRect = int32(512)

Docs.summary: The item displays without the visual cue that indicates it has focus.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The item currently has no state.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DrawItemState Selected = int32(1)
